verbs.description: [ARG0: plane with 188 people aboard] [V: crashes] [ARG1: into sea] [ARGM-TMP: just minutes after takeoff from indonesia] a lion air flight with 188 people on board crashed into the sea just minutes after taking off from indonesia capital on monday indonesia disaster agency posted photos online of a crushed smartphone books bags and parts of the aircraft fuselage that had been collected by search and rescue v indonesia bali rescue agency airasia x airasia muhammad syaugi takeoff rescue office national search boeing pangkal pinang sutopo purwo nugroho sumatra jakarta
